inclusion.criterion: voluntary participation and consent to participate in the study signed by the parent and patient
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: declaration of participation in an X-ray and ultrasound examination during all 8 weeks post-injury
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: no medical contraindications to participate in the study program
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: previous injuries of a similar body area
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient has a confirmed diagnosis of Paget's Disease of Bone and is starting Bisphosphonate therapy. The sister had the same problems at age 52.
